alert.note: Alert for George; Greene; Perry; Stone; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued September 29 at 5:30AM CDT until September 29 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING UNTIL 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR ALL OF SOUTHEAST MISSISSIPPI, SOUTHWEST ALABAMA, AND NORTHWEST FLORIDA DUE TO STRONG WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM CDT THIS EVENING DUE TO A COMBINATION OF LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY VALUES, 20 FOOT WINDS AROUND 15 MPH, AND HIGH KBDI/ERC VALUES... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 051, 052, 053, 054, 055, 056, 057, 058, 059, 060, 067, 075, 076, 078, 079, 201, 202, 203, 204, 205, 206, 261, 262, 263, 264, 265 and 266. * WINDS...Northeast 15 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 23 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
